name: VerificationResult

fields.name: message
fields.description: Message that displays as a result of a verification challenge. SUCCESS if the identity verification is successful. Other values are FAILURE, PENDING, RATE_LIMITED, or FAILURE_REPORT.

fields.name: redirect
fields.description: Where the user is directed after entering the verification code successfully, for example, the community home page or location specified by the start URL.

description: Contains the result of a verification challenge
